mapper.insert: insert into t_report(re_loc, re_date, re_latitude, re_longitude) values(#{re_loc}, sysdate, #{re_latitude},#{re_longitude})
mapper.update: update t_report set re_type = #{re_type}, re_content = #{re_content} where m_id =
mapper.insert: insert into t_member(m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_phone, m_type, m_joindate, admin_yn) values (m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_phone, "U", sysdate, "N")
insert into t_member(m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_phone, m_type, m_joindate, admin_yn) values (m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_phone, "F", sysdate, "N")
